TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssemblyCatalog extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement
Public Class AssemblyCatalog Inherits ComposablePartCatalog Implements ICompositionElement
type AssemblyCatalog = class inherit ComposablePartCatalog interface ICompositionElement

summary.span: 在托管代码程序集中发现特性化部件。

span.span: Discovers attributed parts in a managed code assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于分析指定程序集中存在的所有部分。An is used to parse all the parts present in a specified assembly. 目标程序集可以通过对象引用或路径进行指示。The target assembly can be indicated either by object reference or by path. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型, 请`try` / `catch`在块中调用其方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息, 请参阅接口主题中的 "使用实现 IDisposable 的对象" 一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 此类型是线程安全的。This type is thread safe. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了创建用于分析自己的程序集的应用程序的常见方案。The following code demonstrates the common scenario of an application creating an to parse its own assembly. 这是将单个项目中包含的部件加载到 Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) 的一种简单方法。This is a straightforward way to load parts contained in a single project into the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF). [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/vb/module1.vb#1)]
